channel.title: Abouts on Otolaryngology in Leeds
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Otolaryngology in Leeds

item.title: About Us
item.description: We are Leeds based Consultant ENT Surgeons, practicing at Spire Leeds Hospital, Nuffield Hospital Leeds and Leeds Teaching Hospitals NHS Trust. We offer a full range of adult and paediatric Otorhinolaryngology services to the good people of Leeds and further afield. Having undertaken higher surgical fellowships in Head & Neck Surgical Oncology and Thyroid surgery (JM) and Otology, Neurotology and Hearing Implants (TW) we provide subspecialist care in these areas. We undertake private healthcare for patients insured with all major private healthcare providers as well as self pay patients.
